title: No Worlds Pick'em icon for participating?
body:
I participated on the worlds pickem on october but I still havent got the icon? (The poro one for participating)
Is this some kind of bug am I not meeting requirements? Most replies that I read say that they got it immediatly

replies.body: It can take up to a week to get the Icon after locking in your picks. If you don't have it by the end of the week, reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll take care of you.
I cant find the right request type/form. Can you help me on that?
The first category: "I have a question about League" should work just fine. ^.^
